name: Smash Pool
description:
Description:

Smash Pool is a free-for-all local co-op game, where the white ball MUST NOT stop.

Rules:

Basic pool rules are applied plus:

  • Sinking normal balls is worth 1 point each
  • All balls are fair game, except the black one
    • Each ball is worth 1 point
    • The black ball has to be left for last
      • If someone sinks the black ball, thats -3 points, and the table shoots it back in the middle of the table
      • When the black ball is sinked as the last ball, its 3 points
  • If you let the white ball stop you skip your turn and the next person shoots the stopped ball
Goal:

The game ends when someone sinks the black ball in the final phase. The palyer with the most points wins.

Controls:

Your mouse is the only input. Aim where you want to shoot, hold to poower up your shot and release to shoot.

This version of the game was developed in 42 hours as part of Create Jam Fall 2022.
